cause.description:
As the only true conservative running for president, Tom Tancredo needs the support of grassroots movements throughout the nation. Unlike Rudy, McCain, and Mitt, Tom Tancredo has never flip-flopped on his conservative position. Unlike certain members of the “big three,” Tom has never supported gun control, abortion, raising taxes, or any other liberal measures. Tom Tancredo is a diehard conservative who needs your support in next year’s election.
1. Elect Tom Tancredo
2. End Illegal Immigration
3. Smash Left-Wing Scum
cause.name: Tom Tancredo for President
